name: Dread Silence Endless Warfare
description:
Dread Silence Endless Warfare 1 is an endless runner game where you play as marvel a retired soldier who recently came out of retirement to fight the evil forces that threatens to take over power although he lost his hearing during the war he is determined to bring down the evil forces.

.

*This is a unique style of endless runner which will bring much joy to users

*Top nutch 3d graphics

*Optimised for weak phones

*4 graphics settings at very low, low, medium and high

-In Game features

*3 game mode which is classic, realism and pistol pro

*Upgrade your gun

*Change weapon skin

*In game shopping system

*Battle pass reward system

-app information

*Game is in beta 0.3.2 and is still under heavy development

*Game is available for only android  for now

☺️Download and emjoy☺️
